items.content_html: This package offers a versatile collection of lightweight, scalable, and customizable icons for seamless integration with React and other modern web frameworks. Designed with accessibility in mind, these icons ensure clear, meaningful, and visually consistent representations for various use cases.

Designed with accessibility in mind, these icons ensure clear, meaningful, and visually consistent representations for various use cases.

items.content_html: Source code for the entire OurBigBook Project: OurBigBook.com, ourbigbook CLI and the VS Code extension. A powerful static wiki generator and lightweight markup language to write complex structured wikis/books/blogs with mindmelding magic 🧙

items.content_html: Performant and lightweight Node.js library to convert PDF file/buffer pages to PNG or JPEG files/buffers without binary and OS dependencies (except MacOs on arm64). Designed with high focus on performance and developer experience.

items.content_html: Alke.js is a lightweight, GSAP-powered animation library that enables smooth, responsive animations via simple HTML attributes. Easily add fade-in effects, staggered animations, and more. Fully customizable with support for screen size-based disabling, making it perfect for modern, dynamic web projects.
items.title: NicoSnts/Alke: Alke.js is a lightweight, GSAP-powered animation library that enables smooth, responsive animations via simple HTML attributes. Easily add fade-in effects, staggered animations, and more. Fully customizable with support for screen size-based disabling, making it perfect for modern, dynamic web projects.

items.content_html: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.
items.title: telegramsjs/Telegramsjs: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.
